dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.warning_excluded: You currently have an active self-exclusion. You are excluded from all licensed gambling operators during this period.
dashboard.not_registered: You have not registered any self-exclusions
dashboard.cannot_register: Cannot register new exclusion while one is active
dashboard.why_extending: Why are you extending your exclusion?
dashboard.important_notice: Extending your exclusion will add the selected period to your current exclusion end date.

self_exclude.title: Register for Self-Exclusion
self_exclude.subtitle: Take control of your gambling
self_exclude.description: Self-exclusion is a voluntary tool to help you avoid gambling. When you register with NSER, participating operators will be required to prevent you from accessing their services.
self_exclude.success_message: Your self-exclusion has been registered successfully
self_exclude.error_message: Failed to register. Please try again.
self_exclude.confirmation_text: You are about to register for a self-exclusion. This action is legally binding.

assessment.title: Risk Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Take a gambling risk screening
assessment.description: This assessment helps us understand your gambling patterns and risk level.
assessment.low_risk_interpretation: Your assessment indicates low-risk gambling behavior. Continue healthy habits and monitor your activity.
assessment.medium_risk_interpretation: Your assessment suggests moderate gambling behavior. Consider setting limits and reviewing your habits regularly.
assessment.high_risk_interpretation: Your assessment indicates higher-risk gambling. Professional support is recommended.
assessment.severe_risk_interpretation: Your assessment indicates severe gambling behavior. Immediate professional support is strongly recommended.
assessment.next_step_1: Review your gambling patterns and set spending limits
assessment.next_step_2: Consider talking to a counselor or therapist
assessment.next_step_3: Take another assessment in 30 days to track progress

help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Get assistance and resources
help.what_is_self_exclusion_answer: Self-exclusion is a tool that allows you to request to be excluded from all licensed gambling operators for a period you choose. During this time, operators are legally required to deny you access to their services.
help.can_cancel_early: Can I cancel my self-exclusion early?
help.can_cancel_early_answer: No, self-exclusion is binding and cannot be cancelled during the exclusion period. This is by design to protect you. Only in exceptional circumstances may an early lift be considered - contact support for more information.
help.will_carry_over: Will my exclusion carry over between operators?
help.will_carry_over_answer: Yes! Your self-exclusion is registered in the national database and all licensed operators must check this database when you attempt to access their services.
help.update_profile: How do I update my profile?
help.update_profile_answer: You can update your profile by going to Account Settings in your dashboard. You can change your contact information, preferences, and other account details.
help.verify_identity: How do I verify my identity?
help.verify_identity_answer: You can complete ID verification through Account Settings. Upload a clear copy of your government-issued ID and we'll verify it within 24-48 hours.
help.enable_2fa: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
help.enable_2fa_answer: Go to Security Settings and enable 2FA. You'll receive codes via SMS or an authenticator app for additional account protection.
help.account_compromised: What should I do if my account is compromised?
help.account_compromised_answer: Immediately change your password and enable 2FA if not already enabled. If you suspect unauthorized access, contact support right away with your account details.
help.available_assessments_answer: We offer three evidence-based assessments: LIEBET (brief screening), PGSI (comprehensive), and DSM-5 (clinical criteria). These help evaluate your gambling risk level.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.receive_updates_email: Receive updates and alerts via email
notifications.receive_updates_sms: Receive updates via SMS text message
notifications.get_reminders: Get reminders about your exclusion status

security.verification_code_sent: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to {phone}
